children.textContent: Font Text Wrapping Test - Sans Serif

Font Text Wrapping Test - Sans Serif
    
    Narrow Container (200px) - Word Wrapping Test
    
        This is a test of text wrapping behavior in Liberation Sans font with a narrow container. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. This sentence will wrap multiple times due to the narrow width constraint.
    
    
    Medium Container (350px) - Normal Flow
    
        This paragraph tests text flow in Liberation Sans with a medium-width container. The text should wrap naturally at word boundaries, maintaining good readability while demonstrating how the font handles line breaks and spacing.
        
        
            Long words test: antidisestablishmentarianism supercalifragilisticexpialidocious pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosishyphenated-compound-words
        
    
    
    Different Line Heights
    
        Tight line height (1.2): This text has reduced line spacing to test how Liberation Sans handles compressed vertical spacing. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog repeatedly.
    
    
    
        Loose line height (2.0): This text has expanded line spacing to test how Liberation Sans handles increased vertical spacing. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog repeatedly.
